title: PBE PulseFire Ezreal Bug
body:
Me and my friend we're playing a normal PBE custom game where we 1v1. I was **PulseFire Ezreal** and he was FireCracker Jinx. Once I got level 6 I did the normal animation and then that was the time things went crazy.

PulseFire Ezreal was starting to move really fast, although my movement speed wasn't gaining, so what im trying to say is that i had an animation as if i was moving really fast, although he wasn't. And not only that, I was also a white block on the map, and when i died to turret, it said a turret got excuted by a turret.
 
PBE: Bot Ezreal Bot
 
LOL: CakeCaik

replies.body:
Hey CakeCaik! 

Thanks for the report! 

This a known issue and as you've mentioned, is a visual bug! 

In the future, please report PBE-related bugs on the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/). It helps us keep track of what issues are on the PBE, versus what issues are on live. :]
